message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth surpasses $1000000, but I am willing to consider your offer. To make this proposition attractive, I propose a starting price of $950000. Please let me know if this aligns with your interests and budget. I look forward to discussing the details further with you.
